org.pac4j.core.util

Class HttpUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pac4j.core.util.HttpUtils

  • public final class HttpUtils
extends Object
    This class provides utility functions to deal with opening connections, building error messages and closing connections, etc.
    Since:
    1.8.0
    Author:
    Misagh Moayyed
